ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Provide the reason why the procedure was not done.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PRREASND
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The reason the data are not available may be chosen from a sponsor defined list (or example, broken equipment, subject refused, etc.) or entered as free text. When PRREASND is used, the SDTMIG variable PRSTAT should also be populated in the SDTM-based dataset. The value "NOT DONE" here indicates that the subject was not questioned/data was not collected. It does not mean that the subject did not have the procedure.

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the reason not done?
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the reason not done?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If evaluation was not done specify reason

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: If bone marrow biopsy was not performed, please specify why it was not done:

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: If bone marrow aspirate was not performed, please specify why it was not done:

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: If MIBG scan was not performed, please specify why not done:

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: If bone marrow evaluation was not done, please specify why it was not done:
